linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: First-generation Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Recent Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Navigating The Labyrinth Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: First-generation Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Recent Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 or better
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
